name: Highlee (English)
description:
highlee

Highlee is a 72 hour game for Mağra Jam #2. The plot is you have to cheat to win the game.

PROJECT ASSIGNMENTS:

Burcu Küçükkaya (Burcu#1336): Concept Artist, Illustrator, Pixel Athist

Can Aydogan (Can Apocalypse#4747): Screenplay.

Emre Crump (crump#0001): Software, Musician

Efe Uludag(Zack Kane#0063):Software.

HOW TO INSTALL?

Download the RAR file.

Extract the RAR file to a folder.

Open the folder and run the ".exe" extension in it.

NOTE: Do not parse the files and run them all together. Otherwise, the game will not open.

HOW TO PLAY?

W/D: Classic movement keys.

SPACE: Jump key.

MOUSE Left Click: Makes Highlee throw a knife.

Finally,

We kindly ask you to download and evaluate our game as a reward for the efforts we put into this project.

Thanks!

ADDITIONAL DETAILS

Highlee was developed in Unity. Some in-game audio is taken from Jam's presentation to the contestants, MadRooster Sound Library, and no other assets or ready-made tools are used.
